notes:
To ensure smooth upgrades going forward, please follow these one-time steps if you have previously installed Celeste POS v1.2.0 or earlier:

1. Open Control Panel → Programs → Uninstall a Program
2. Look for POSSystemApp-v1.2.0 (or your currently installed version)
3. Right-click and Uninstall it

Future versions will update automatically without this step.
